title: OptiPro Nitrile Gloves Powder-Free EN455 Medical Standard - Pack of 100 Blue Ambidextrous Latex Free Disposable Gloves for Medical Examination
features: Premium Quality Nitrile Gloves: Designed for durability and comfort, providing reliable protection for various tasks.
Latex-Free & Powder-Free: Ideal for users with latex allergies, ensuring a comfortable fit without compromising safety.
Versatile Use: Suitable for medical examinations, food handling, cleaning, and other applications requiring hygiene and protection.
Ambidextrous Design: Fits both left and right hands, making them convenient for quick and easy use.
Disposable Convenience: Single-use gloves help maintain hygiene and reduce the risk of cross-contamination.
Packaged for Efficiency: Comes in a box of 100 gloves, providing a large supply for both personal and professional use.
description: Protect your hands with our premium nitrile gloves. These latex-free, powder-free gloves offer excellent durability, comfort, and flexibility—perfect for medical use, food prep, cleaning, and more. Each box contains 100 disposable gloves, available in multiple sizes to ensure a secure fit for everyone. Ideal for professionals and home users alike.
